name: Stranded Sails - Prologue
description:
Stranded Sails - Prologue takes place one day before you hoist the colour to the main journey. You can try out all features like decorating, farming and exploring and see if the sea is calling for you! Explore the whole island and every corner and decide if you want to join us on the cursed islands.

The main game includes much more feature -> which you can find here:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/943260/
